name: Wavy Navy (itch)
description:
Wavy Navy is a game that ship and cannons are separated.  It's a survival that you' re trying to get the highest score.

The game on liluo.io : https://liluo.io/leminol/wavy-navy

NOTE: Tab key for releasing in Browsers crashes the game. DO NOT USE IT! Right click :)

This game is build for GDevelop Game Jam 3.

The Assests that I used:

  •  Intro Music
  • Game Song
  • BigBoy(Boss) Song
  • Cannon release sound
  • Menu click sound
  •  Wooden Box
  •  Cursor
  • Ships that I used
